Name: FAUCET VR
About the game: 'FAUCET VR' is a VR game based on the popular casual mobile game for healing 'FAUCET'. Enjoy dabbling in a fantastic virtual space popping falling drops from faucet. Sewer monsters would interrupt your healing time by trying to block the overflow holes, but donâ€™t worry. You will have a chance to enjoy another kind of pleasure. You can get special rewards by collecting the flying alphabets and stars falling from the sky with a scoop net. When you are in a danger, try using ice and fire. They could be quite helpful. One more thing. We recommend you to to just relax yourself listening to beautiful music sitting on one side of the sink.
